Articles.Content: So Sad. Minor oversight, really. But it's still gonna be an expensive contract failure.
It's an impossible contract demand. Temperature of Gilly at an alt over 6500, denied. Impossible.

Sorry but we can't help with this, the fineprint contracts just pick a part and some values, Squad decided you shouldn't use some science devices at certain times.

You can try using the debug screen to force contract completion, press Alt+F12
